feed.title: PatrickRoyMac.github.io/
feed.subtitle: Hello, I drink too much caffeine and stay up to late for someone that is meant too be an "adult".

entry.title: About me!
entry.content:
Patrick MacCarthy - Update

I am a passionate young tech enthusiast that is pushing myself to excel in an already competitive industry. I have a passion for all things cloud and completing projects which re-imagine how we deploy / build / manage different services. I believe that the ‘Infrastructure as code’ model is the future and push myself to automate everything I need to do more than once. Working as a team and bouncing ideas of each other is how I press forward and am also up for those technically challenging conversation.

What do I currently do?

Primary role:

  • Maintain the current running state of the SaaS Business within a suitable SLO / SLA
  • Developing the CI/CD pipeline from R&D to Cloud deploying regular software updates to the SaaS Customers
  • Management of small team with the mantra of DevOps building new services for the business to consume
  • Architect new technology, building primarily on AWS - Expertise in automation tools such as Teamcity, hooked in with Cloudformation to provide build pipelines.
  • Management of >1000 EC2 instances across multiple VPC’s using both Linux and Windows for Operating systems with the theory of Cattle not Pets.
  • Using the ITIL Framework as a guide for best practises when developing a stable environment
  • Maintaining the Sprint project management to build, test, deploy new products
  • Build, deploy and management of database technologies such as RDS, Dynamo and sql - Currently learning postgres
  • Making production decisions based on the analytics from the data services which is gathered from elastic.
  • Deployment of a new operational alerting system for the business - Using Pagerduty with API calls for information passing -Development on API’s across multiple vendors
  • Working with customers to build the best solution for their needs
  • Development and Understanding on Git Workflows
  • Languages I am proficient in - Bash, Python, Powershell and Javascript

I have a passion for all things cloud and completing projects which re-imagine how we deploy / build / manage different services. I believe that the ‘Infrastructure as code’ model is the future and push myself to automate everything I need to do more than once. Working as a team and bouncing ideas of each other is how I press forward and am also up for those technically challenging conversation.
